content: आसत्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [आ-सद्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Meeting, junction. {@--2@} Intimate union, nearness, close contact; किमपि किमपि मंदं मंदमासत्तियोगात् <ls>U. 1. 27.</ls> {@--3@} Gain, profit, acquirement. {@--4@} (In Logic) Proximity, the absence of interruption in the apprehension of what is said, relation between two or more proximate terms and the sense conveyed by them; कारणं सन्निधानं तु पदस्यासत्तिरुच्यते <ls>Bhāṣā P. 83</ls>; वाक्यं स्याद् योग्यताकांक्षासत्तियुक्तः पदोच्चयः <ls>S. D. 2.</ls>
